body_html: As @yaroslavvb explained, the second argument b has different semantic meaning in tf.slice and tf.strided_slice. this was confusing to me, because i thought tf.strided_slice is an extension of tf.slice except for the stride.
body_text: As @yaroslavvb explained, the second argument b has different semantic meaning in tf.slice and tf.strided_slice. this was confusing to me, because i thought tf.strided_slice is an extension of tf.slice except for the stride.
body: As @yaroslavvb explained, the second argument `b` has different semantic meaning in `tf.slice` and `tf.strided_slice`. this was confusing to me, because i thought `tf.strided_slice` is an extension of `tf.slice` except for the stride.
